# Copilot Instructions

## Project Guidelines
- For Google Maps World View: Do NOT download any GeoJSON files from the internet. Use only Google Maps API standard functionality with data-driven styling. The user has configured: Map ID eb64f89d349abcdbea900459, Dataset ID 3695db17-21fc-48d4-94ea-bdc7218fe18b (called "Country"), Map Style "Country" with data-driven styling enabled on feature layer "Country".
- When the user says "tooltips", they refer to the custom map tooltips in the World View tab (Google Maps country hover tooltips showing country name and connection count), not Bootstrap tooltips.
